responsibilities: Work on research problems to improve vision and multimodal models.
Contribute to the development of open foundation models.
Experiment with mobile robots in real-world settings.
Build infrastructure for multimodal language models and digital agents or simulation infrastructure for mobile robotics.
Collaborate with researchers and engineers on other Ai2 teams.
Lead select projects and author scientific papers and presentations.
Develop infrastructure to deduplicate and analyze datasets at scale.
Optimize training and inference for language models.
Support and collaborate with an open-source community.
Use software engineering best practices in a research environment.
qualifications: Strong understanding of modern deep learning and computer vision.
Strong software engineering skills, particularly in building performant systems and debugging.
Familiarity with container technologies (e.g., Docker) for deploying web-based services.
analysis:
The job involves several responsibilities and skills that are indicative of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The responsibilities include "Work on research problems to improve vision and multimodal models," "Contribute to the development of open foundation models," "Build infrastructure for multimodal language models and digital agents," and "Optimize training and inference for language models." These tasks suggest a focus on developing and improving models that can generate or understand language, which is a key aspect of GenAI and LLMs.

Additionally, the skills required for the job include "Experience with natural language processing," which is directly related to working with language models. The mention of "Strong understanding of modern deep learning" and "Experience with Python and PyTorch" further supports the involvement with AI models, as these are common tools and frameworks used in developing and training such models.

Overall, the combination of responsibilities and skills strongly indicates that the job involves working with Generative AI and language models.
